title: Good Morning, Mister Dragon! - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Josei   Mature   Psychological   Romance
tags: Female Protagonist   Possessive Characters   R*pe   Stockholm Syndrome
author: Han Jiangxue   韩降雪
description: Framed by her so-called best friend and half-sister, Su Qianxun stumbled upon a strange man when she was making her escape. A strange man so handsome it looked as if his face was carved by the Gods, but with a heart as cold as stone. A wild and fiery night ensued, and ever since then, they embarked on a journey filled with passion, lust, conspiracy and treachery.>
